title: Land For Sale In Kurunegala Narammala
details:
- Land for sale in Narammala area.

_ 24 perches land for sale in Narammala area for Your dream home.

- 10 minutes drive to Kurunegala and within in seconds You will be in Narammala town.

- Faced to Negombo Kururnegala main road.

- Very calm and quiet surrounding which matches for a couple who is hoping to spend peaceful family life.

- Serious buyers only. ( price is negotiable )
